mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BANKBOOK (BOOKNUMBER, BOOKNAME, BOOKCONTENTS, BOOKRATE, BOOKSALE) VALUES(BANKBOOK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{bookName}, #{bookContents}, #{bookRate}, #{bookSale})
mapper.update: UPDATE BANKBOOK SET BOOKNAME = #{bookName}, BOOKCONTENTS = #{bookContents}, BOOKSALE = #{bookSale}, BOOKRATE = #{bookRate} WHERE BOOKNUMBER = #{bookNumber}
